Name: Mukaddas
description:
Mukaddaslivers in Qubadijon, a region in the southwest [of Tajikistan]. This region  is located in the valley in the Kafirnigan river. The southern part of the region borders with Afganistan; the state border is formed by the Pyanzh river.The climate in the region is continental: the change of seasons is relatively mild and imperceptible; there is practically no winter in the full sense of the word.

Mukaddas lives in one of the villages of this region together with her family. Her husband is a construction foreman. Mukaddas does not have children yet; she is already 35 years old. At present Mukaddas would like to dedicate her efforts to a new business. She plans to launch a business buying and reselling almonds. Since she lacks the starting capital, she has applied for a loan. By starting a new business, Mukaddas will be able to increase the family budget and improve her life conditions.
